State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: This mod allows preload F4SE plugins before the game initializes.
State.Name: xSE PluginPreloader F4

State.Author: T41NT3D
State.Description: Reduces the 10mm by 20%
State.Name: 10mm Pistol Resize

State.Author: MarkReal
State.Description: Changes the Adrenaline perk to actually make sense and not be an op damage buff
State.Name: Adrenaline Redone - A Logical Approach

State.Author: EAGnR
State.Description: This mod balances the Adrenaline mechanics for survival mode, especially for those who are using mods which allow the player to save outside of sleeping. You will no longer have an Adrenaline buff indefinitely throughout the day dependent solely on whether you save or not by sleeping, instead you will have to risk yourself to maintain it. (+ More)
State.Name: Adrenaline Rush

State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper - Leviathan1753
State.Description: Ambient Wasteland is back! Immerse yourself in the wastes with sounds of wildlife and more! Ported over from Fallout 3, Ambient wasteland offers many new ambient sound effects added seamlessly into the base game.
State.Name: Ambient Wasteland - Fallout 4 Edition

State.Author: JackArbiter
State.Description: All Optional - AI Overhaul, Stealth Overhaul, Controllable Lowered Weapons, Fall Damage Overhaul, Damage Overhaul, Compass Overhaul, Molotov Overhaul, Grenade Throwing Delay, Grenade Detection Increase
State.Name: Arbitration - Combat AI - Stealth - Speed - Damage - Gameplay Overhaul and Tweaks

Original.Name: Armor and Weapon Keywords Community Resource v8.6.0-6091-v8-6-0-1578253623.rar

State.Author: Gambit77 - Thirdstorm - Valdacil
State.Description: This is a master file to create a standardize framework for armor so that modders can create and modify armor (like Armorsmith) while making edits compatible with mods that adjust dynamic item naming (like Valdacil's Item Sorting). Also adds a standardized set of crafting menu categories for armor/clothing/weapons and adds two workbenches for m
State.Name: Armor and Weapon Keywords Community Resource (AWKCR)

State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: Gambit77
State.Description: This mod does so much awesome stuff that the description doesn't come anywhere close to fitting here.
State.Name: Armorsmith Extended

State.Author: Kris Takahashi
State.Description:
The Tales from the Commonwealth mod adds quests and companions. 

The Atomic Radio mod adds a radio station. 

The Settlers of the Commonwealth mod adds settlers with interesting dialogue.  



Go to 3dnpc.com for details.
State.Name: Atomic Radio and Tales from the Commonwealth

State.Author: Markyrocks
State.Description: Fixes the Automatron DLC and Robot Workbench in the VR version of Fallout 4
State.Name: Automatron DLC VR FIX

State.Author: Gambit77 - Thirdstorm - Valdacil
State.Description: A cleanup project for AWKCR in two parts: one that removes excess content, and another that will streamline LLs for other modders to use!
State.Name: AWKCR-R - An Unofficial Armor and Weapons Keyword Community Resource Fork (Tidy Up - LL Streamline)

State.Author: BmanBlazer
State.Description: This mod adds a brand new Backpack system to the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Backpacks of the Commonwealth

State.Author: GrozaTerroristow
State.Description: Barefoot footstep sounds for naked character
State.Name: Barefoot Footstep

State.Author: CylonSurfer
State.Description: This mod is aimed at 'Room Scale' players who enjoy using a real chair while their character uses furniture pieces in game. It adds a 'L.A Noire: VR Case Files' inspired approach to using furniture pieces in Fallout 4 VR.
State.Name: Be Seated Fallout 4 VR Edition

State.Author: Recluse
State.Description: Combines the effects of Companion Infinite Ammo, No Companion Power Armor Damage, Companions Can Sneak, and No Companion Fall Damage, for vanilla, DLC, and Mod Companions, WITHOUT making any edits to vanilla records and WITHOUT scripts. No overwrites, no conflicts. Now with Increased Companion Accuracy option.
State.Name: Better Companions - No Conflicts

State.Author: Thom293
State.Description: Better Settlers is a lore friendly mod that adds more than 240 new settlers to the vanilla settler selections. You can choose to stop there, or further OPTIONS to customize them to spawn with more lore-friendly changes to their equipment, gender ratio, stats, or mortality.  DLC and no-DLC versions and many other options available.
State.Name: Better Settlers

State.Author: Mika999
State.Description: This mod adds more authentic NPCs and many new details to improve overall The Third Rail atmosphere and immersive gaming experience.
State.Name: Better The Third Rail

Original.Name: Bladed Weapons Redux for VR DLC-30046-V1-0.7z

State.Author: Hicsuntdracones1
State.Description: Like sharp things? Playing in VR? This mod might be for you...
State.Name: Bladed Weapons Redux for VR

State.Author: Me
State.Description:
Simple mod that changes the corny blood spray to a more realistic and appealing mist. Minimal. Simple. Rad.



The engine handles all weather conditions, so this will react with wind and gravity. Yes, i know.  Its awesome. 



LOAD AFTER YOUR FAVORITE BLOOD MOD.
State.Name: Blood Mist Overhaul

State.Author: Elvani
State.Description: This mod brightens all player-built lights. Multiple versions for multiple brightness levels.
State.Name: Brighter Settlement Lights

Original.Name: Cait Fix for Automatron DLC VR Fix-40794-1-0-1566603296.zip

State.Author: joycourier
State.Description: Required by VR users playing with Automatron DLC if they want to fix Cait's missing perk.
State.Name: Cait Perk Fix for Automatron DLCVR

State.Author: Ousnius and Caliente
State.Description: The well-known body enhancer made famous in Skyrim is back for Fallout 4 debut
State.Name: Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Enhancer -CBBE-

Original.Name: Chem Redux - No ESP Version - Glow Version-2099-2-0NoESP.zip

State.Author: herpderp2332
State.Description: This is a full compilation of all of my texture packs, plus bonus textures
State.Name: Chem Redux

State.Author: Raumfliege
State.Description:
Hate it when you can't find your active Companion(s), then this is the mod for you. The Companion whistle teleports your active Companion(s) to you. 

It also works with non companion followers.
State.Name: Companion Whistle

State.Author: The Iron Rose
State.Description: Works on every difficulty! Create your own re-balance mod! Edit the damage you deal and the damage dealt to you.
State.Name: Create Your Own Difficulty Rebalance

State.Author: NotSure700
State.Description: This mod adds a perk which allows the player to get critical hits outside of V.A.T.S. The hit chance is determined by the player's luck and can be increased by the perk 'Four Leaf Clover' and the drug 'Overdrive'.
State.Name: Critical Hits Outside of VATS

State.Author: TrickyVein
State.Description: Adds a new crank-cocking crossbow weapon to the commonwealth.
State.Name: Crossbows of the Commonwealth

State.Author: Xazomn
State.Description: Complete Creatures Overhaul HQ & Unique realistic Textures. All created with Photo resources & hand painted.
State.Name: Crows And Creatures

State.Author: frogs345
State.Description: Restores cut weapon mods for a number of weapons.
State.Name: Cut Weapon Mods Restored - CWMR

Original.Name: Dark Nights-True Storms and Vivid Weather Custom Settings ESPs-45429-1-1591337093.zip

State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: jim
State.Description: A true-to-original reskin of the deathclaw to add extreme skin/hide-level detail.
State.Name: Detailed deathclaws

State.Author: LiquidBronze
State.Description: Diamond City Plus is an overhaul to Diamond city, which adds many new shacks/buildings to the lower stands along with 35+ new NPC’s (i.e. for my interior and exterior locations, along with the market, the farm, etc) and have AI packages or set to default sandbox.
State.Name: Diamond City Plus

Original.Name: Diamond City Plus- No Crowd Sound-45429-1-1591144619.zip

State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: ANiceOakTree
State.Description: Overhauls existing children to have new face and body textures, as well a face diversity with 4 possible faces meshes and textures for each gender. Also gives children new hairstyles, and adds child settlers.
State.Name: ANiceOakTree's Diverse Children

Original.Name: DLC Leveled List Integration and Rebalance - Reduced Loot-30367-1-2-1540090028.7z

State.Author: Urtho
State.Description: This mod adds all DLC items to the appropriate leveled lists so that all DLC items can be found all over the gameworld, either in the Commonwealth or in other DLC areas.
State.Name: DLC Leveled List Integration and Rebalance

State.Author: Maduin81
State.Description: Fixes a variety of compatibility issues when using DLC on the VR version of the game.
State.Name: DLCVR - Fallout 4 VR and DLC  standalone bug fixes

State.Author: DOOM
State.Description: All of my Fallout 4 weapon mods in one plugin. Including 16 highly customizable guns and a few unique variants with all new models, textures, sounds and animations. Thank you to everyone in the Nexus mods Community for making this the most downloaded weapon pack for Fallout 4!
State.Name: DOOMBASED Weapons Merged (Weapon Pack)

Original.Name: DOOMBASED Weapons Merged VR Patch AWKCR-29774-V2-2.7z

State.Author: Hicsuntdracones1
State.Description: VR patch for DOOMBASED Weapons Merged by DOOMBASED
State.Name: DOOMBASED Weapons Merged VR Patch

State.Author: zilav
State.Description: Only the single correct password with be shown in hacking minigames of any difficulty.
State.Name: Easy Hacking

State.Author: The Iron Rose
State.Description: Allows you to ignore the lockpicking minigame.
State.Name: Easy Lockpicking

Original.Name: Eli's Armour Compendium - CBBE and BodySlide 1.5-22431-1-5.7z

State.Author: Elianora
State.Description: Mod ads 50 new lore-friendly armours, 20 accessories, tons of moddable colours. Institute, Settler, Wastelander, Raider, Vault suit. Both sexes. Vanilla and CBBE body, with BodySlide compatibility.
State.Name: Eli's Armour Compendium

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: This mod allows you to have Dogmeat and a standard companion at the same time using in game functionality (not hacks or console commands).
State.Name: Everyone's Best Friend (Dogmeat and Companion At Same Time - No Console - No Hack)

State.Author: Castell
State.Description: Retextured sunglasses and goggles.
State.Name: Eyewear and mask retexture

State.Author: Pat Mahoney
State.Description:
A soulful requiem for a bygone era. 

81 songs, 4 hours of new music, inspired by old world jazz, rock, and EDM.

Written and recorded by Pat Mahoney.
State.Name: Faded Glory - A Post-Apocalyptic Soundscape

State.Author: TheFriedturkey
State.Description: Today I finally get to share my work for the Capital Wasteland project with the world. The ghouls from fallout 3 and New Vegas are something that i have been wanting to do for a very long time, recently i had the opportunity and took it.
State.Name: Fallout 3 - NV Feral Ghouls Replacer

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: FallUI HUD for Fallout 4 VR improves the in-world displays for usage with Item Sorters.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD VR

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: SparrowPrince
State.Description: FAR optimises and improves over six thousand distant land textures, which means more perfomance and less stutter.
State.Name: FAR - Faraway Area Reform

Original.Name: Faster Terminal Displays (20x) Creation Kit Version-937-3-0.zip

State.Author: Old Nick
State.Description: Speeds up the text display on terminals
State.Name: Faster Terminal Displays

State.Author: rustedmill
State.Description: Changes the messages you get to first person messages.
State.Name: First Person Messages

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This mod fixes artefacts, pixelation and color banding in textures that are used for special light effects. Zero performance loss, little to nothing strain for your VRAM, no esp needed, no reason to not use it.
State.Name: Fixed Gobo Effects

State.Author: RandomMrBlue
State.Description: This mod provides a basic framework for the addition of weapon, armor, and eventually Pip Boy skins for Fallout 4 VR. It intends to supply the framework missing from the base game to allow things like the use of Creation Club skins, or other weapon or armor skins.
State.Name: FO4VR Skin Framework

State.Author: 3 Gouls and a Supermutant
State.Description: Fog Remover II improves the games appearance and performance by removing Interior Fog, Mist, Steam, Dust, Smoke and Airborne Debris. Featuring the new "Interior Fog Remover" option / standalone mod.
State.Name: Fog Remover - Performance Enhancer II

State.Author: Lapdragon
State.Description: version 1.3 - makes weapon downgrading free
State.Name: Free Weapon Downgrades

Original.Name: Give Me That Bottle - DLC (Requires Far Harbor)-13193-2-6a.zip

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Ever wondered that you drink a beer for example and the bottle is magically gone? With the new survival mode you could use the bottle to get some water! But how to get this bottle!? Give Me That Bottle fixes that and gives a bottle in return! This mod adds new water bottles and cooking recipes to turn your dirty water into purified wate
State.Name: Give Me That Bottle

Original.Name: No Health from Food and Drink-19495-1-0.7z

State.Author: LolzMan1325
State.Description: Food and drink don't heal, except this one should be compatible with modded food and drink, as well as all default food and drink, without changing the forms of the items themselves.
State.Name: Global Food and Drink Health Removal

Original.Name: Glowing Animals Emit Light - ALL DLC-9239-1-1.zip

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: Simply makes glowing animal variants emit light, scaled to their size.
State.Name: Glowing Animals Emit Light

State.Author: Transient3292
State.Description: This mod aims to flesh out Goodneighbor and make it feel more like a bustling inner-city settlement of the commonwealth. It overhauls Goodneighbor's layout to add life and more NPC activity with new areas to explore, new interiors, vendors and new NPCs.This is a WIP.
State.Name: Goodneighbor Expanded

State.Author: llamaRCA
State.Description: April 2017 #1 File of the Month: Heather is a complex, story-driven character with over 1200 lines of custom, voiced dialogue, quests, etc. Heather's unique implementation is designed to improve on the FO4 companion experience.
State.Name: Heather Casdin - A Unique Companion Experience by llamaRCA

State.Author: llamaRCA DarkDominion J3tAc3 and Rusey
State.Description: This mod contains patches made by members of the community to use with Heather Casdin - A Unique Companion Experience by llamaRCA. Current patches available: Full Dialogue Interface, Bhaal's Better Sorting, Valdacil's Item Sorting and Armorsmith Extended
State.Name: Heather Casdin - Assorted Patches

State.Author: joycourier
State.Description:
Replaces the Steady Aim perk and changes ranks 2 & 3 of Commando and Heavy Gunner.

Intended for people who remove the concept of 'hipfire' from their games, especially VR.

Also fixes Nuclear Physicist.
State.Name: Hip-Fire Perk Replacers

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Adds craftable display shelves that hold holotapes and even one for the 5 Game Tapes. Display your collection at your settlements. ESL available.
State.Name: Holotape Display Shelves

State.Author: KhaoMaat
State.Description: Hide HUD elements in VR including stealth, notifications & compass while retaining subtitles if desired.
State.Name: HUIDE_VR - Hide HUD Elements in VR

State.Author: CylonSurfer
State.Description: Idle Hands will provide Fallout 4: VR players with visible hands (and Pipboy) in varity of styles and skin tones, customisable via the mods FOMOD installer. Players will have visible hands with /without weapons being drawn, which change to Power Armor hands when a frame is entered (Pairing nicely with 'Kabuto:VRs' visible Power Armor helmets).
State.Name: Idle Hands

Original.Name: Idle Hands v3.0.3 Left Hand Edition Beta-42922-3-0-3-1604482734.zip

State.Author: CylonSurfer
State.Description: Idle Hands will provide Fallout 4: VR players with visible hands (and Pipboy) in varity of styles and skin tones, customisable via the mods FOMOD installer. Players will have visible hands with /without weapons being drawn, which change to Power Armor hands when a frame is entered (Pairing nicely with 'Kabuto:VRs' visible Power Armor helmets).
State.Name: Idle Hands

State.Author: CylonSurfer
State.Description: Idle Hands will provide Fallout 4: VR players with visible hands (and Pipboy) in varity of styles and skin tones, customisable via the mods FOMOD installer. Players will have visible hands with /without weapons being drawn, which change to Power Armor hands when a frame is entered (Pairing nicely with 'Kabuto:VRs' visible Power Armor helmets).
State.Name: Idle Hands

Original.Name: FOMOD Installer - Immersive Burning Molotovs and Flamers (Flamers Optional)-34084-1-2.7z

State.Author: Aphest
State.Description: Overhauls Molotovs to have a tactical use and real explosion values gathered from real-life Molotov explosions. Script-free! Flamers Optional!
State.Name: Immersive Burning Molotovs and Flamers

State.Author: AKcelsior
State.Description: Safely removes insignificant objects to improve performance without visual degradation.
State.Name: Insignificant Object Remover

State.Author: HcG x Grill TheFriedturkey
State.Description: The fourth release on the road map, the centaurs. These are based off a fallout 4 scrapped concept art
State.Name: Institute Centaurs

State.Author: Maduin81
State.Description:
This mod enables fast travel to Settlements only while in Survival Mode.  



There are now three versions -

Realistic - Fast travel only works from settlement to settlement and only with supply lines connecting the settlements

Restrictive - Fast travel to Sanctuary Hills, Home Plate, and The Castle from anywhere.

Easy -
State.Name: JOURNEY - Survival Settlement Fast travel

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Add grunt voices and controller vibration for player jump.
State.Name: Jump  Grunt

State.Author: Cylon_Surfer
State.Description: Kabuto:VR is an immersive Power Armor helmet replacement mod for 'Fallout 4 VR' which replaces the lackluster semi-transparent Power Armor HUD with a selection of fully enclosed helmets based on the games original helmet meshes - with a little "artistic license". Now includes optional P.A.F.A.S (Power Armor Frame Activation System) Module.
State.Name: Kabuto VR

State.Author: ANiceOakTree
State.Description: Overhauls existing children to have new face and body textures, as well a face diversity with 4 possible faces meshes and textures for each gender. Also gives children new hairstyles, and adds child settlers.
State.Name: ANiceOakTree's Diverse Children

State.Author: asXas
State.Description: This mod adds an Lee Enfield No.4 Mk.1 alongside a small quest.
State.Name: Lee Enfield No.4 Mk.1 - Britain's Finest

State.Author: CptCOOTS
State.Description: Tired of spamming Sleeping Bags and Mattresses in Survival Mode? This lets you sleep up to 8 hours in sleeping bags and on dirty mattresses on Survival Mode. HOWEVER, you only gain the benefits you normally would from sleeping on that type of bed.
State.Name: Let Me Sleep (Maximum Compatibility)

State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: Bretton
State.Description:
Replaces every single loading screen in the game with a thought provoking quote or phrase that fits in with the world of fallout. 



Get more invested into the gloomy atmosphere of the game while waiting for it to load instead of reading a tip about fast travel that you've read a million times.
State.Name: Loading Screen Quotes

State.Author: XLSJ
State.Description: Allows bullet holes and other impact effects to be shown at long ranges. Made with FO4Edit.
State.Name: Long Range Bullet Holes

State.Author: Puma
State.Description: Lets you make connections from afar.
State.Name: Longer Power Lines

State.Author: Moonracer
State.Description: Main file reduces ammo, meds and bobby pin drops while logically diversifying loot into appropriate containers. Optional files for more functionality.
State.Name: Loot Logic and Reduction With optional Harvest Restrictions

State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: Recluse
State.Description: Adds a good number of new male facial hair combinations. All done with ESP file only. Currently includes 100+ new facial hair choices.
State.Name: Lots More Facial Hair

State.Author: Koozebane
State.Description: Face beautification for our favorite Irish arena moll. New version 1.0.3 includes extensive facial structure tweaks and is a sneak preview snapshot of the upcoming Presets Collection.
State.Name: Loving Cait

State.Author: KhaoMaat
State.Description: Bad performance in the Institute? Don't want to remove all lights? Try this mod! Performance will be through the roof! Covers the concourse as well as adjacent locations. VR & pancake compatible.
State.Name: Lucid Institute - Performance Optimization - VR Compatible

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Locked containers now factor in your level of Luck as well as the difficulty of the lock to determine what kind of loot can be found in the container.
State.Name: Lucky Loot

State.Author: Ascendia
State.Description: Made for personal use but thought someone may like it
State.Name: Mama Murphy tweak

Original.Name: More Feral Ghouls. A Zombie Mod-43441-0-9-1581441117.rar

State.Author: Deathlock47
State.Description: Makes the lame generic and stupid followers into brilliant little snowflakes with abilities to match them.
State.Name: More Smarter Companions Mod

State.Author: Korodic and Dovahklon
State.Description:
Have you ever wonder why the NPCs mostly just stay at the same floor, even though the cell (regardless where at) has multiple floors?



Do you have a nice custom home that has multiple floors in the same cell(i.e. no loading doors), and you want your NPCs to move up and downstairs more?



This little tweak should address that
State.Name: Multiple Floors Sandboxing

State.Author: Nir Shor
State.Description: This mod Adds Lore friendly professionally produced music tracks to your Fallout 4 playlists.
State.Name: Musical Lore - Wasteland Edition (Soundtrack Mod By Nir Shor)

State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: KhaoMaat
State.Description: An alternative way for a silent protagonist. Mutes the player voice using an .esp plugin file. The plugin lowers the volume of the sound category for player voice to 0.
State.Name: Mute Player Voice

State.Author: DisplacerBeast8u
State.Description: My personal preset for Curie, which attempts to capture her youthful personality and positive outlook while not straying from her original appearance.
State.Name: Natural Curie - Subtle Tweaks

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: Just makes the Impact Landing not turn friendly NPCs hostile
State.Name: No Aggro Impact Landing (Power Armor)

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A small plugin to remove combat boundaries, so enemies will follow you indoors from outside and vice versa.
State.Name: No Combat Boundaries

State.Author: Trentosaurus
State.Description: For those of us that enjoy the ambient music while exploring the wastes but prefer silence when in battle.
State.Name: No Combat Music

State.Author: hellstorm102
State.Description:
Are you a user effected by legendary items crashing your game 50% of the time?



Wish you could just loot them like normal items?



This mod if for you!







This sets the FeaturedItem_DO Action to NONE, Effectively disabling the popup, and in turn disabling the resulting crash on effected systems.
State.Name: No Featured Item popup

State.Author: givemetehfilez
State.Description: Just beautiful, glorious silence.
State.Name: No Idiot Savant Noise

State.Author: twizz0r
State.Description: A simple texture replacement to remove the persistent fake puddles from the game. No more fake reflections!
State.Name: No More Fake Puddles

State.Author: dDefinder
State.Description: This will remove the 90% damage reduction while you are in VATS so that you will now take full damage. This will increase the risk of using VATS while under fire or when an enemy is in melee range
State.Name: No VATS Damage Reduction

State.Author: dDefinder
State.Description: This will remove the 90% damage reduction while you are in VATS so that you will now take full damage. This will increase the risk of using VATS while under fire or when an enemy is in melee range
State.Name: No VATS Damage Reduction

State.Author: slaugh7er
State.Description: Choose whether you should collide with certain objects in the world
State.Name: Player Collision Options

State.Author: Moonracer
State.Description: Changes a few common leveled lists that add items to dead NPCs in order to reduce stimpaks in the world and give characters, character.
State.Name: NPC Loot Drop rebalance

State.Author: skyquest
State.Description: Adds over 300 NPC's who traveling the Commonwealth, Far Harbor, Nuka-World.
State.Name: NPCs Travel

State.Author: Myst
State.Description:
Fixes and tweaks textures for performance improvements. Minimal to nonexistent quality loss.



Free fps!
State.Name: Optimized Vanilla Textures

State.Author: Old Nick
State.Description:
Fixes the a few of the perk magazine world models using the high res material path.

(Mainly for Glowing Magazine mods)
State.Name: Perk Magazine Material Fix

State.Author: idlesheep
State.Description: A wearable JETPACK for your journey over commonwealth.
State.Name: Personal Jetpack

State.Author: Phylith
State.Description: Lighting and texture changes.
State.Name: PhyLight

State.Author: Cobal
State.Description: A Flashlight like light mod for your pipboy in VR.
State.Name: PipBoy VR light

State.Author: Karamazovnew
State.Description: Normalizes brightness of glowing sights found on handmade (pipe) guns, by altering the fColorRemappingIndex attribute of the vanilla receivers. Works in non-VR mode, although it's more useful for VR users.
State.Name: Pipe guns glow sight fix

State.Author: Truth2
State.Description: We will adapt the save data MOD " Natural Mom " to Piper.
State.Name: Piper -Natural Mom-

Original.Name: Ponytail Hairstyles by Azar v2_5a - BA2 version-8126-2-5a.zip

State.Author: Azar
State.Description: New standalone hairstyles for your characters.
State.Name: Ponytail Hairstyles by Azar v2.5a

State.Author: eyeshkeeper
State.Description: The mod adds the ability to make lore friendly homemade weapons to the game. A pistol, rifle, bolt-action rifle, revolver rifle and machine gun. All weapons can be modified. A machine gun that can also be used to make a powerful rifle.
State.Name: Post-apocalyptic homemade weapons

State.Author: XGriffinH34rtX
State.Description: This is a mod that takes our favoutite minuteman and reforms him into a whole new character!
State.Name: Preston Garvey Overhaul (P.G.O.)

State.Author: a_blind_man
State.Description: Adds functional binoculars to the game.
State.Name: PreWar Binoculars

State.Author: HULKHOD3N x PR BF2 DevTeam
State.Description: Changes almost all footstep sounds into more realistic ones. Including subtle gear and backpack rattle. *Snow Edition* available.
State.Name: Project Reality Footsteps FO4

State.Author: Ayelius and scrivener07
State.Description: Adds a secondary button (similar to holotapes) to quickly swap your current equipped weapon with the one you're point at with your crosshair. Configurable via MCM.
State.Name: Quick Weapon Swap

State.Author: MASmarksman
State.Description:
Increases radiation by 300% (4 times as much) in the Wasteland.

It affects foods, drinks, water, environments, enemies!

For those who deemed the Post-Nuclear World to be too newb-friendly!

Radiation damage type weapons are NOT affected (as to not make them OP).
State.Name: Radiation Overhaul - 4x More Radiation Across the Wasteland

State.Author: TheKetzku
State.Description: A very quick Fallout 4 mod which simply allows the external radio music to be effected by reverb.
State.Name: Radio Reverb Fix

State.Author: GardenRemsoy
State.Description: A radiation overhaul adding many more radiation pockets to the commonwealth.
State.Name: RADS

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Changes the Diamond City Guards, so that they no longer all wear the same gear, and instead have randomized helmets and armor pieces.
State.Name: Randomized Diamond City Guard Outfits

State.Author: MunkySpunk
State.Description: A first for FO4: They tumble in the air, stick where you hit, pick them up or loot them off dead NPCs. Over 30 weapons, workshop targets, and new SoundFX including tomahawks, shurikens, harpoons, shoes, fidget spinners, thundersticks and more! Integrated crosshairs and slo-mo aiming (requires F4SE) make them useful medium range weapons in combat.
State.Name: Real Throwing Weapons

State.Author: Gorgulla
State.Description: Every social logic in Fallout for NPCs is changed, they talk more often to each others. And will less likely greet to you from a distance, they will also greet less often too, making them to not act as much as robots. NPCs are also more clever and will know for example if they talked to a NPC and will therefore talk to another or not talk at all.
State.Name: Realistic Conversations Fallout 4

State.Author: dDefinder
State.Description:
Ragdolls now reflect real life physics instead of cartoons.



Force types:

Realistic - Ragdolls will slump down where they stand

Action - Same idea as Realistic but with minor knock back

Reduced Reduced Explosion Force - This will reduce the amount of force applied to items and bodies to about half
State.Name: Realistic Ragdoll Force

State.Author: MarkReal
State.Description: Allows you to Sprint for more than 5 seconds at a time and a little faster
State.Name: Realistic Sprinting - A Logical Approach

State.Author: crismanator02
State.Description: Some quick dirty edits to make some sound mods work together including Reverb andAmbiance Overhaul with True Storms, Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul  with Ambient Wasteland Patch.This was made with VR in mind, but it will work for the pancake version to.
State.Name: GingasVR's Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul _True Storms Patch  Reverb_Ambient Wasteland Patch and more

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description: Put your settlers to work carrying all your loot back to your settlements so you can focus on saving the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Salvage Beacons

State.Author: DeadPool2099 - The Shiny Haxorus and friends
State.Description: This mod will add Service Rifle from Fallout New Vegas, based on legendary M16 platform, with completely scratch-made assets and animations
State.Name: Service Rifle

State.Author: Project Valkyrie Discord Server
State.Description: Tired of hearing the same old lines from companions and settlers? Wish they had more to say? Or gave quests? Now they do.
State.Name: Settler and Companion Dialogue Overhaul

State.Author: Kris Takahashi
State.Description:
The Tales from the Commonwealth mod adds quests and companions. 

The Atomic Radio mod adds a radio station. 

The Settlers of the Commonwealth mod adds settlers with interesting dialogue.  



Go to 3dnpc.com for details.
State.Name: Atomic Radio and Tales from the Commonwealth

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description: Settlers should build their own damn houses (and farms, and shops, and...), you've got a Commonwealth to explore!
State.Name: Sim Settlements

State.Author: Sim Settlements Team
State.Description:
It's time to take the settlements to War.



Includes

- Option to prestart the game with pre-built settlements run by NPCs for you to explore and Conquer.

- Convert settlements to military outposts for your favorite factions and run attacks with them.

- Quest line to play as a Raider. 

- New Sim Settlements content.
State.Name: Sim Settlements - Conqueror

State.Author: OisinR
State.Description: Automatically skips the DIMA memory puzzles when doing the quest "Best left forgotten".
State.Name: Skip DIMA memories - Far Harbor

Original.Name: Start Me Up - Alternate Start and Quick Start-18946-2-0.zip

State.Author: TinyManticore
State.Description: Provides Alternate start, Quick start, Normal start options.  When you use one of the alternate start paths, there are over 800 dialogue edits, with voice and lip sync, so your character is no longer the mother/father of Shaun (or even a Vault Dweller, if you want).  Great for role players.
State.Name: Start Me Up - Alternate Start and Dialogue Overhaul

Original.Name: 2.5x increased radius 5x increased light level falloff-16804-1.zip

State.Author: Lukezkee
State.Description: 2.5x increased radius and 20x increased falloff
State.Name: Streetlight Radius Fix

State.Author: Chiaro22
State.Description: This mod adds 11 new, atmospheric interiors to the Commonwealth; from failed businesses to rundown bars, long abandoned homes, and even a dark crypt or two.
State.Name: Stumble Upon Interiors

State.Author: Thicketford
State.Description: Replaces the sneak indicator with something more subtle.
State.Name: Subtle Sneak Text Indicator

State.Author: Kris Takahashi
State.Description:
The Tales from the Commonwealth mod adds quests and companions. 

The Atomic Radio mod adds a radio station. 

The Settlers of the Commonwealth mod adds settlers with interesting dialogue.  



Go to 3dnpc.com for details.
State.Name: Atomic Radio and Tales from the Commonwealth

State.Description: My Outfit pack that contains all of my previous work (B-90, Rebel, SNCR) plus a new Gunner overhaul and Wastelander outfits that fits for exploring the commonwealth.
State.Name: The Mercenary - Pack

Original.Name: The Mercenary - Pack v0.9.c - plugin only update-20088-0-9c.zip

State.Author: L0rd0fWar
State.Description: My Outfit pack that contains all of my previous work (B-90, Rebel, SNCR) plus a new Gunner overhaul and Wastelander outfits that fits for exploring the commonwealth.
State.Name: The Mercenary - Pack

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: The #5 highest ranked Skyrim mod of 2015 with over 10,000 endorsements comes to Fallout 4 with even more features than ever!  True Storms: Wasteland Edition is a complete overhaul to the storm systems in Fallout 4. Heavy rains, dust storms, radiation rains.  New unique weathers, sound effects, particle effects, textures and more.
State.Name: True Storms - Wasteland Edition (Thunder-Rain-Weather Redone)

Original.Name: Nuka World Add-On (with TS Far Harbor Compatibility)-4472-1-4-1NWBet.rar

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: The #5 highest ranked Skyrim mod of 2015 with over 10,000 endorsements comes to Fallout 4 with even more features than ever!  True Storms: Wasteland Edition is a complete overhaul to the storm systems in Fallout 4. Heavy rains, dust storms, radiation rains.  New unique weathers, sound effects, particle effects, textures and more.
State.Name: True Storms - Wasteland Edition (Thunder-Rain-Weather Redone)

State.Author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

State.Author: Detrax
State.Description: Tweaks for V.A.T.S. (Affects targeting, combat, SlowMo effects, Mysterious Stranger, disable killcam and critical hit cam, critical bar, hit-chance, engage distance,)
State.Name: VATS Tweaks

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: Tagging items for sorting built using FO4Edit.  Does not modify Strings.  Modular installation to suit your preference.  Includes tagging of dynamic names generated for weapons and armor with upgrades.  Now compatible with armor mods that use the Armor and Weapons Keyword Community Resource (AWKCR) (like Armorsmith Extended).
State.Name: Valdacil's Item Sorting

State.Author: Cthulhu And Me
State.Description: Expands the face pool for the generic, otherwise faceless guards of the "Great Green Jewel" Piper never shuts up about.
State.Name: Varied Diamond City Guards

State.Author: CylonSurfer
State.Description: Adds 5 virtual weapon holsters  and new weapon sheathing / equipping system which aims for a more realistic approach forcing the player to return a weapon to the holster it was drawn from before being able to equip another weapon.
State.Name: Virtual Holsters

State.Author: CDante
State.Description:
It's simple.

It's clever.

It's small.

It's something you've been missing from the start.
State.Name: Visible Companion Affinity

State.Author: Hein84
State.Description: all Vivid Fallout textures combined in one ba2
State.Name: Vivid Fallout - All in One

State.Author: Mangaclub
State.Description:
This is a complete LORE FRIENDLY Weather and Climate Overhaul for Fallout 4! 

It will add more than 75 new Weathers with over 110 new cloudtextures to the Fallout 4 World for you to experience. 

It also improves the general Image quality by adding new LUT and Imagespaces to the game as well as a Player home and base to complete the Lore!
State.Name: Vivid Weathers - Fallout 4 Edition - a Weather Mod and Climate Overhaul

State.Author: KhaoMaat
State.Description: Revises the VATS effect in VR. No longer any green tint. Visuals will be completely neutral.
State.Name: VR Neutral VATS

State.Author: Oh Deer
State.Description: Project to remake all of the explosives in the game.
State.Name: VWR - Vanilla Weapons Redone - Explosives

State.Author: LucidLady - NoCashNoExp
State.Description: Simply a consumable item which will open the Wait menu, anytime, anywhere.
State.Name: Wait Menu Consumable Item

State.Author: joycourier
State.Description:
I've made adjustments to the spread and recoil of all weapons while still keeping the game balanced (E.G; rifle stocks are still worth it). 

Intended for FO4VR, obviously ruins balance of regular Fallout 4.
State.Name: Weapon Accuracy Redone for VR

State.Author: Seb263
State.Description:
Weapons of Fate is a mod that makes bullets behave in a more interesting and realistic manner.



Each bullet has unique characteristics that are combined to determine the trajectory that the bullet will follow.

Also, bullets no longer dissapear after a certain distance, instead losing in altitude until their point of impact.
State.Name: Weapons of Fate (Ballistics Overhaul)

State.Author: Wenderer
State.Description: This is set of merge patches for True Storms and Vivid Weathers mods.
State.Name: Weather Synergy - True Storms and Vivid Weathers merge patch

Original.Name: West Tek Tactical Optics v2.0.1 (minor update)-12220-2-0-1.rar

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Night Vision / Thermal / Targeting HUD goggles and eyepieces with new meshes and HD textures. Fully modular, craftable, upgradeable. 3 vision effects, 8 colors, and 2 additional targeting enhancements. Schematics posters also in the Workshop!

State.Description: Allows you to rename settlers by asking them for their name

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: Bilago
State.Description: This is a modification for the Fallout 4 Configuration Tool (https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/102/) This version works with BOTH versions of the game, however I cannot submit the same mod under Utilities AND VR simultaneously. So here I am creating a new mod page entirely.
State.Name: Fallout 4 VR Configuration Tool

State.Description: Replaces the male-centric intro cinematic to a female perspective. Lore Friendly!

State.Author: Peregrin0
State.Description: Compatibility patch for Everyone's Best Friend (EBF) and version 2.1.0 of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (UFO4P). Both modify the same Papyrus script files causing one to override the corrections of the other. This mod merges the script changes.
State.Name: EBF UFO4P compatibility fix

State.Description:
Create Fallout 4 VR mods based on VR controller input events

Supports PapyrusVR and C++/F4SEVR API

State.Description: Player character Pipboy texture replacer.
State.Name: Seen Better Days Player PIPBOY Retexture

State.Author: Shizof
State.Description: An F4SEVR plugin to eliminate jitter/stutter/judder caused by collision when walking/running on bumpy roads and terrain. Moving will feel like skating on ice. No more headaches or nausea caused by playing Fallout VR.
State.Name: Smooth Movement VR

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: The Complex Sorter from FallUI Item Sorter Mod. Automatically add item tags to all items. Highly versatile and completely configurable: custom processing rules, custom tag sets, custom naming rules. You can just change anything to your liking. Standard rules support most custom mods out-of-the-box.

Original.Name: 2K (A.W.H.D.) All Weapons High Definition 1.3 DLC Included Loose Format-8556-1-3.rar

4K upscale of every weapon in the game 0.o Yup you heard right, Every single one!



Heavy Weapons, Melee Weapons, Pipe Weapons, Pistols, Energy Weapons, Explosives, Rifles, And Shotguns!



2K Performance Friendly Version Now Available!



DLC Weapons Included.
State.Name: All Weapons HD (A.W.H.D.)

State.Author: Shizof
State.Description: bHaptics Tactsuit integration mod for Fallout VR. Many different haptic effects on Vest, Arms and Face including feedback from enemy melee, gun, grenade damage, player weapon fire, rain, chem/food usage, power armor walk, jetpack, heartbeat, swimming and much more.

State.Description:
Make Fallout 4 always take most of CPU usage

Increase FPS and Prevent suddenly lag caused by other processes

State.Description:
Overhauls the stars to 4K from 1K.

Adds some big stars but most is small stars you can also chose to have only small stars, Glimmers dynamically when moving around.
State.Name: Fallout Texture Overhaul Stars

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: Speeds up game start by storing INI files in memory instead of opening, parsing and closing the file each time some value from it is needed.

State.Author: inawe
State.Description: This mod removes several ugly flat trash decals that are used frequently all over the Commonwealth.  It cleans up some locations quite a bit without changing anything other than a few textures and material files.
